query.value:
select min(a.work_date) as str_date
	,max(a.work_date) as end_date
from (
	select to_char(base_date,'yyyymmdd') as work_date
			,row_number() over (order by base_date) / (4)::int as rnum
		from cd_ods.aps_sdc_pw_mst a
			,(
				select distinct period
				from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master                       
			) b
		where 1=1
		--and base_date between date('2022-04-17') and date('2024-08-12')
		and base_date between date('2024-08-29') and date('2024-09-01')
		and b.period = @{pipeline().parameters.period}
	) a	 
where  1=1  -- 
group by a.rnum
order by a.rnum

oracleReaderQuery.value: select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(  'I' , p_pipline => 'PIP_SFTP_MARKETLINK_FULL' ) as result from dual;
@concat('select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(''U'' , p_seq => ''', activity('Input log').output.firstRow.RESULT, ''', p_result => ''S'') as result from dual')

@concat('select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(''U'' , p_seq => ''', activity('Input log').output.firstRow.RESULT, ''', p_result => ''E'', p_error_msg => ''', replace(activity('PIP_SFTP_MARKETLINK_FULL').Error.Message, '''','‘'),''') as result from dual')
